title: 4/25/17 - Who's really running this place?... Eric Liu Joins Glenn
description:
Revisiting "The Coming Insurrection" and how its movement is blossoming today ...100 senators meet The White House about North Korea ...Happy Armed Forces Day...in North Korea! ...Who is the Winston Churchill of 2017? ...What's next for Bill O'Reilly?...Progressive professor visits Glenn to talk civics ...'Citizen Gardeners' ...Is Bill Nye even a scientist? ...Worst moment in broadcast history? ...My vagina has a voice but conservatives don't??

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
